des:
Remo+ video doorbells and smart cameras are the easiest to install and feature high-quality video, 2-way talk, advanced motion detection, night vision, and more. Remo+ allows you to keep an eye on your home and loved ones from wherever you are via the free Remo+ mobile app.

You can control your Remo+ device with Amazon Alexa devices using these commands:*

- "Alexa, show my [front door camera]"
- "Alexa, stop my [front door camera]"
- "Alexa, hide my [front door camera]"

*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of your desired camera.

To get started, tap on the “Enable" button and follow the on-screen instructions to link your Alexa account with your Remo+ account.

Additionally, you can now have Alexa make an announcement or set off a routine when someone activates your Remo+ device. (e.g. your smart light blinks when your DoorCam detects motion or music plays when someone rings RemoBell S)

Simply turn on “Announcements” for your Remo+ device from the Smart Home section of the Alexa App or create an Alexa Routine from the main menu on the app.

To turn on announcements:
 1) Open up your Alexa app
 2) Click on “Devices” and click “All Devices”
 3) Select your connected Remo+ device
 4) Turn on the “Doorbell Press” feature and/or the “Motion Detection Feature”

To enable a routine:
 1) Open up your Alexa app and click on the Menu icon
 2) Choose “Routines” and press on the +
 3) Select “When this happens,” then press “Devices,” and choose your Remo+ device
 4) Choose the action that will set off your routine
 5) Choose your routine’s notification sound

Visit www.remoplus.co for more information.

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:*
 - Echo Show
 - Echo Spot
 - All generations of Fire TV
 - Fire TV stick (Generation 2 only)
 - Fire TV Edition smart TVs
 - Fire Tablets (Generation 7 & above)

*Video Streaming is only available for DoorCam, RemoBell S, and RemoBell W.
